name: log-file-parser
title: Log File Parser
description: Parse and analyze log files with filtering, regex pattern matching, and statistics
content:
Overview

This application parses and analyzes log files, extracting entries by log level, filtering with regex patterns, and generating statistics summaries.

Features

  • Parse common log formats (timestamp, level, message)
  • Filter by log level (ERROR, WARNING, INFO, DEBUG)
  • Regex pattern matching for advanced filtering
  • Generate statistics summary (counts by level, timestamp range)
  • Uses Python re module for robust pattern matching

Parameters

  • Input Log File: Upload your log file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a parsed log file with optional statistics header showing log level distribution and timestamp range.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && python prod_apps_clone/python/log_file_parser.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" --stats
